tags.name: Enterprise API
tags.description: Owned and maintained by Enterprise API team.

post.description: Submit a premium payment for the given agreement key.

agreements.description: An array of payments to be submitted / modified

paymentMethod.description:
Type of payment. Valid values are ACH or CC (credit card).
Applies to GuestPay (payments made by unauthenticated
user) only.

billAmountDue.description:
Amount due of the bill being paid. Applies to GuestPay
(payments made by unauthenticated user) only.

billDueDate.description:
Due date of the bill being paid. Format - yyyy-MM-dd.
Applies to GuestPay (payments made by unauthenticated
user) only.

paymentInstructions.description:
Customer provided instructions on how to apply the
payment. Required when submitting an amount other than the
amount currently due.

email.description:
The email address to send the payment confirmation to.
Optional. If not sent the email will be sent to the email
address of the registered owner.

suspenseInd.description:
Identifies whether the payment should be sent to the
suspense account. CSR only. Valid values are Y or N.

loanToPayPremiumIndicator.description: Indicates whether the policy is eligile for Loans to Pay Premium feature.  Valid values are Y or N.

submitAPLPaymentInd.description: Indicates whether the payment is an APL payment.  Valid values are Y or N.

accountType.description: Type of bank account. Valid values are Checking and Savings.

secCode.description:
The method the approval to use the bank account information was
obtained. Valid values are TEL (telephone), WEB (user-initiated
online), PPD (prearranged payment and deposit).

bankAccountPayment.description: Bank account information used when submitting a payment

bankHolderInfo.description:
Mailing address of the bank account holder. Applies to
GuestPay (payments made by unauthenticated user) only.

firstName.description: The first name of the person who owns the bank account.

lastName.description: The last name of the person who owns the bank account.

line1.description:
The address of the person who owns the bank account.
Optional.

line2.description:
Additional address of the bank account holder.
Optional.

line3.description:
Additional address of the bank account holder.
Optional.

city.description: The city of the bank account holder. Optional.

state.description: The state of the bank account holder. Optional.

postalCode.description: The zip code of the bank account holder. Optional.

email.description: Email address of the bank account holder.

phone.description:
Phone number of the bank account holder. Optional.
Valid formats - (111) 222-3333, 1112223333,
111-222-3333

cardType.description:
The credit card company backing the transaction. Valid values are
VISA, MC (Mastercard), AMEX (American Express), DV (Discover).

authorizationCode.description:
The code obtained from the credit card processor issued when the
payment authorization request was done.

cardOrderId.description:
The credit card processors order ID that identifies the purchase
agrangement.

last4.description: The last four digits of the crdit card.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the crdit card.

fullName.description: fullname of card holder

cardNumberLastFour.description: The last four digits of the credit card.

creditCardPayment.description: Credit card information used when submitting a payment

runDate.description: The date the BAV validation check was run.

resultCode.description:
The BAV validation outcome. This indicates whether the validation
was successful or not.

validationLevel.description: Translated resultCode value as stored in wallet preference.

transType.description: The API request executed by the consumer.

transGuid.description: Unique identifier for this exact transaction.

transExecDateTS.description: Date / Time the request was executed.

messages.description:
List of Errors, Warnings and or informational messages returned by
the back end service or related to the processing of the initial
request. Can contain service failures, validation messages...etc.

msgType.description: Type of message. ERROR, WARNING, INFORMATIONAL

msgCode.description: Alphanumeric code associated with the message.

msgDescription.description: Description inidicating what the message pertains to.

payments.description: An array of responses related to the submitted payments

success.description:
Boolean indicator of whether or not the payment operation was
successful. This does NOT indicate if the payment was processed yet.
Only that the request was successfully received.

paymentId.description:
The ID associated to the payment. This ID is used when modifying
/ deleting existing payments. It is NOT required when submitted
NEW payments.

get.description: Search and Get PAC data for an agreement, insured Name and DOB.

transType.description: The API request executed by the consumer.

transGuid.description: Unique identifier for this exact transaction.

transExecDateTS.description: Date / Time the request was executed.

messages.description:
List of Errors, Warnings and or informational messages returned by
the back end service or related to the processing of the initial
request. Can contain service failures, validation messages...etc.

msgType.description: Type of message. ERROR, WARNING, INFORMATIONAL

msgCode.description: Alphanumeric code associated with the message.

msgDescription.description: Description inidicating what the message pertains to.

agreements.description: An array of agreements with PAC Data

agreementKey.description:
A 4-part holding identification used to uniquely specify an MM
holding, consisting of Holding ID Prefix, Holding ID Primary,
Holding ID Suffix and Admin System.

lineOfBusiness.description:
The highest level designation of the product type for a
holding.  For example Life, DI, Annuity.

prefix.description: Any name prefix of the insured such as Dr., Mr., Mrs., etc.

firstName.description: The first name of the insured.

lastName.description: The last name of the insured.

suffix.description: Any name suffix of the insured such as Jr., Sr., III, etc.

fullName.description: The full name of the insured.

birthDate.description: The date of birth of the insured.

billingMode.description:
A billing option available on premium paying policies.
Examples of each mode include annual, semi-annual,
quarterly, and monthly, Single Premium or No Bill

billedPremium.description:
Billed premium includes all premiums (both the base policy
and any applicable rider premiums) on the policy bill.

recurringPayments.description: Information on an existing PAC account setup.

bankAccountHolder.description: The name of the bank account holder.

bankName.description: The name of the bank the draft is drawn from.

routingNumber.description: The routing number of the bank the draft is drawn from.

accountNumber.description: The bank account number the draft is drawn from.

accountType.description:
The type of bank account the draft is drawn from. Checking or
Savings.

draftDay.description: the day of the month on which the draft is taken.

startDate.description: The first day the PAC draft is effective. Format - yyyy-MM-dd.

endDate.description: The last day the PAC draft is effective. Format - yyyy-MM-dd.

additionalAgreements.description: An array of agreements that are on also the PAC account.

pacSetupInfo.description: Information needed to setup a PAC account on the agreement.

accountTypes.description:
An array of bank account types that can be used for the draft -
Checking or Savings.

defaultDraftDay.description: The default draft day for the policy

availableDraftDays.description: The available draft days for the policy

canChangeDraftAmount.description:
The ability to change the draft amount for the policy - true of
false.

canChangeDraftDay.description: The ability to change the draft day for the policy - true of false.

availableFrequencies.description: An array of valid payment frequencies the PAC can be setup for.

policyIsPastDueMessage.description:
if the policy is past due -return message stating that multiple
drafts will happen next month

contactInformationMessage.description: Message stating why contact information is needed.

termsAndConditions.description: Terms and Conditions for setting up a PAC account

modalPremiums.description:
Projected modal premium amounts for the different payment
frequencies.

billingType.description:
Identifies which billing type the modal premium applies to. Valid
values are REG or PAC.

billingMode.description:
The frequency the modal premium applies to. Valid values are M, Q,
SA, A.

billingModeDesc.description:
A description of the billingMode. Valid values are Monthly,
Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual.

amount.description:
The modal premium amount applicable to the frequency and billing
type.

annualizedAmount.description: The amount multiplied by the billingMode.

modalCharge.description: The amount charged for electing a billing mode other than Annual.

apr.description: The APR of the modal charge.

Update a payment associated to the given payment Id and agreement key.
This is only available when the payment is still 'pending' status.

agreementKey.description:
A 4-part holding identification used to uniquely specify an MM
holding, consisting of Holding ID Prefix, Holding ID Primary,
Holding ID Suffix and Admin System.

lineOfBusiness.description:
The highest level designation of the product type for a
holding.  For example Life, DI, Annuity.

minorProductName.description: The name of the minor product code of the agreement.

majorProductName.description: The name of the major product code of the agreement.

ltcActiveRiderIndicator.description: An indicator that states if there is a LTC rider on the policy.

ltciActiveRiderIndicator.description: An indicator that states if there is a LTCi rider on the policy.

loanToPayPremiumIndicator.description: An indicator that states if policy is eligible for loan to pay premium.

netPremiumAmountToDate.description: The total amount of premium paid to the policy from issue.

availableFunctionality.description:
An array of funtionality with boolean indicators as to the
availability of each

functionality.description:
A given set of functionality that may or may not be available for
the given agreement key based on restriction codes and other
business rules.

available.description:
Boolean indicator of the availability of the given function
indicated in the functionality field

reason.description:
Description of why functionality is not available. Only populated
when 'available' is FALSE

restrictionCodes.description: An array of any restriction codes that were applied to the data.

code.description: The restriction code that was applied.

condition.description: Explanation of what triggered the restriction.

premiumBills.description:
An array of bills from the IBF database where the due date
is not more than 62 days old.

billNumber.description:
The bill number housed in the IBF database. Used by lockbox to
ensure payments are processed correctly.

currentBillAmountDue.description:
Amount due including riders, interest and or reduction from
dividends.

currentBillDueDate.description: Due date of the current bill.

aplInd.description: APL indicator of the current bill.

apdInd.description: APD indicator of the current bill.

billingMode.description: Frequency code of the current bill.

billingModeDesc.description: Frequency description of the current bill.

paymentId.description: The ID of the payment that has been made on this bill. Optional.

paymentAmount.description: The amount of the payment that has been made on this bill. Optional.

paymentDate.description:
The date the customer requests the payment to be effective on.
Optional.

submissionDate.description: The date a payment was submitted by the customer. Optional.

paymentStatus.description:
The status of the payment that has been made on this bill. Optional.
Valid values are Pending, Processing, Paid.

paymentPending.description: Identifies if there is a payment pending for this bill. Optional.

documentAvailInd.description: Indicates whether the bill image is available.

documentIds.description: An array of document IDs matching the Prep and Due dates of the bill.

documentObjStoreId.description: Document Object Store ID for the image of the current bill.

documentGuid.description: Document GUID for the image of the current bill.

billingType.description:
Type of bill. Examples are NORM (normal), REM (reminder), RBIL
(re-bill)

billComponents.description:
An array of components that make up the bill and the amount of that
component. Example of components - premium, loan interest, dividend
reduction, etc.

code.description: The code that identifies the bill component.

description.description: A description of the bill component.

amount.description: The portion of the bill for the component.

billedPremium.description:
Billed premium includes all premiums (both the base policy
and any applicable rider premiums) on the policy bill.

billedPremiumDisplay.description:
A message indicating what the consumer should display when
the billedPremium is unavailable.

policyDraftAmount.description:
Billed premium includes all premiums (both the base policy
and any applicable rider premiums) on the policy bill.

billingMode.description:
Policy-level billing frequency code. Examples of each mode
include annual, semi-annual, quarterly, and monthly, Single
Premium or No Bill

billingModeDesc.description:
Translated value of the code located in the billing mode
field.

eBill.description:
Policy is associated to an Electronic billing or electronic
bill payment and presentment feature. This is when a
company, organization, or group sends its bills over the
internet, and customers pay these electronically.

paidToDate.description:
The date to which policy premiums have been paid or date to
which the policy is currently funded. The date is normally
updated each time a premium payment is processed.

paymentPreference.description:
The method of billing for a policy. Values include - Direct,
Check Service or Pre Authorized Check, Premium Waiver, List
Bill, No Bill

paymentPreferenceDesc.description:
Translated value of the code located in the payment
preference field.

billDeliveryPreferenceDesc.description:
Translated value of the code located in the bill delivery
preference field.

invoiceFranchiseNumber.description:
The  bill number used to identify all policies where the
billing is consolidated into a single bill.

nextSchedulePremiumDueDate.description:
This date is not the paid to date, but the due date of the
next premium to be billed.

totalPremiumsPaid.description:
The total premium paid (including both base policy premium
and any applicable rider premiums) within a policy from the
date of policy inception.

sdoMpoApoCd.description: The SDO/MPO/APO code of the policy.

sdoMpoApoPaymentForm.description: The SDO/MPO/APO payment form of the policy.

paymentArrangement.description:
The translated SDO MPO APO code. Applies to MPR, OPM, and
VNTG1 policies only.

canEditPaymentAmount.description:

an amount other than the amount due.

extended.description:

component. Example of components - premium, loan interest, dividend
reduction, etc.

code.description: The code that identifies the bill component.

description.description: A description of the bill component.

amount.description: The portion of the bill for the component.

billedPremium.description:
Billed premium includes all premiums (both the base policy
and any applicable rider premiums) on the policy bill.

billedPremiumDisplay.description:
A message indicating what the consumer should display when
the billedPremium is unavailable.

billingMode.description:
Policy-level billing frequency code. Examples of each mode
include annual, semi-annual, quarterly, and monthly, Single
Premium or No Bill

billingModeDesc.description:
Translated value of the code located in the billing mode
field.

paidToDate.description:
The date to which policy premiums have been paid or date to
which the policy is currently funded. The date is normally
updated each time a premium payment is processed.

paymentPreference.description:
The method of billing for a policy. Values include - Direct,
Check Service or Pre Authorized Check, Premium Waiver, List
Bill, No Bill

paymentPreferenceDesc.description:
Translated value of the code located in the payment
preference field.

nextSchedulePremiumDueDate.description:
This date is not the paid to date, but the due date of the
next premium to be billed.

isOnAutoPay.description:
Indicates whether the policy is on an auto-payment schedule
(PAC or Recurring Payment).

isOnAutoPayLoan.description:
Indicates whether the policy is on an auto-payment schedule
(Recurring Payment) for a Loan.

isOnAutoPayLoanInterest.description:
Indicates whether the policy is on an auto-payment schedule
(Recurring Payment) for Loan Interest.

autoPaAvailableFryequencies.description:
An array of modal frequencies available for AutoPay. This
includes both PAC and Recurring Payment options.

billingMode.description: The auto pay frequency. Valid values are M, Q, SA, A.

billingModeDesc.description:
A description of the billingMode. Valid values are Monthly,
Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual.

type.description: The type of auto pay. Valid values are PAC and RecurringPayment.

amount.description: The modal premium of the biling mode. Optional.

hasCustomerRecord.description:
Indicates whether a customer record already exists. If
it doesn't then one will need to be created before a recurring
payment can be setup.

paymentSourceCode.description: The source of the payment. Valid values are LGCYPAC, MMPAY, MMPAC.

modalPremiums.description:
Projected modal premium amounts for the different payment
frequencies.

billingType.description:
Identifies which billing type the modal premium applies to. Valid
values are REG or PAC.

billingMode.description:
The frequency the modal premium applies to. Valid values are M, Q,
SA, A.

billingModeDesc.description:
A description of the billingMode. Valid values are Monthly,
Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual.

amount.description:
The modal premium amount applicable to the frequency and billing
type.

annualizedAmount.description: The amount multiplied by the billingMode.

modalCharge.description: The amount charged for electing a billing mode other than Annual.

apr.description: The APR of the modal charge.

billNumber.description:
The bill number housed in the IBF database. Used by lockbox to
ensure payments are processed correctly.

currentBillAmountDue.description:
Amount due including riders, interest and or reduction from
dividends.

currentBillDueDate.description: Due date of the current bill.

loanInterestDueDate.description: Date of Interest Due for loan on the policy

loanInterestAmount.description: The amount of current interest owed on the loan.

payoffAmount.description:
The current total amount required to pay off all outstanding loans
including interest. This amount is based on current day.

payoffAmountAsOfDate.description: The date on which the payoffAmount is valid.

advancedPayoffAmount.description:
The aggregate total amount required to pay off all outstanding loans
including interest. This figure is projected out two weeks for
payoff consideration.

advancedPayoffAsOfDate.description:
The pay-by date required to pay off all outstanding loans including
interest. This figure is projected out two weeks for payoff
consideration.

outstandingPrincipalBalance.description: The aggregate total principal amount of all outstanding loans.

loanInterestAmountTotal.description: The up to date loan interest amount total due on loans.

twoDayAdvancedPayoffAmount.description:
The aggregate total amount required to pay off all outstanding loans
including interest. This figure is projected out two days for payoff
consideration.

twoDayAdvancedPayoffAsOfDate.description:
The pay-by date required to pay off all outstanding loans including
interest. This figure is projected out two days for payoff
consideration.

twoDayAdvancedPayoffPrincipal.description: The principal portion of the total payoff amount.

twoDayAdvancedPayoffInterest.description: The interest portion of the total payoff amount.

autoPay.description: Details of an autopay feature (Recurring Payment)

autoPayId.description: The ID of the recurring payment. Recurring Payment only.

amount.description: The amount of the draft.

createdDate.description:
The day on which the draft was originally setup. Recurring
Payment only.

draftDay.description: The day of the month the draft is taken from the bank account.

startDate.description: The date on which the draft starts.

endDate.description: The date on which the draft ends.

billingMode.description: The frequency of the draft. Valid values are M, Q, SA, A.

billingModeDesc.description:
A description of the billingMocdeCode. Valid values are Monthly,
Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual.

numberOfPayments.description:
The number of payments to be made before the auto-pay terminates.
Recurring Payment only.

remainingPayments.description:
The number of payments left before the auto-pay terminates.
Recurring Payment only.

nextScheduledPaymentDate.description: The date of the next scheduled payment.

paymentSourceCode.description: The source of the payment. Valid values are LGCYPAC, MMPAY, MMPAC.

paymentMethodCode.description: The method of the payment. Valid values are ACH, WALLET, CC.

hasCustomerRecord.description: customer record

statusCode.description: The status of the auto-pay. Valid values are ACTV,HOLD

availableFrequencies.description:
An array of modal frequencies available for AutoPay. This
includes both PAC and Recurring Payment options.

billingMode.description: The auto pay frequency. Valid values are M, Q, SA, A.

billingModeDesc.description:
A description of the billingMode. Valid values are Monthly,
Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual.

type.description: The type of auto pay. Valid values are PAC and RecurringPayment.

amount.description: The modal premium of the biling mode. Optional.

hasCustomerRecord.description:
Indicates whether a customer record already exists. If
it doesn't then one will need to be created before a recurring
payment can be setup.

paymentSourceCode.description: The source of the payment. Valid values are LGCYPAC, MMPAY, MMPAC.

billedPremium.description: The premium associated tot he policy.

paymentProfileId.description: The ID of the payment profile used to pay the draft. Recurring Payment only.

bankAccountHolder.description: The name of the bank account holder paying the draft.

bankName.description: The name of the bank the draft is being drawn from.

routingNumber.description: The routing number of the bank the draft is being drawn from.

accountNumber.description: The bank account number the draft is being drawn from.

accountType.description:
The type of bank account used to pay the draft. Valid values -
Checking and Savings.

paymentProfileName.description: The nickname of the payment profile used to pay the draft. Recurring Payment only.

totalAmount.description:
The total draft amount charged to this bank account. This
includes the premium for all policies on the PAC account.

paymentMethodCode.description: The method of the payment. Valid values are ACH, WALLET, CC.

payments.description:
An array of any payments for the given loan. These payments could be
pending or processed.

billNumber.description: The bill ID associated to the payment.

paymentId.description:
The ID associated to the payment. This ID is used in the URI when
modifying / deleting existing payments.

firstName.description:
The first name of the bank account owner. Mutually exclusive with
fullName.

lastName.description:
The last name of the bank account owner. Mutually exclusive with
fullName.

fullName.description:
The full name of the bank account owner. Mutually exclusive with
firstName and lastName.

requestedPaymentDateAndTime.description:
Date and timestamp payment is requested to be processed on. This is
not always the same as the date the payment was submitted. Format
should be ISO 8601 format with timezone offsets. ex
1990-12-31T15:59:60-08:00

amount.description: The dollar amount to be paid.

paymentProfileName.description:
The name of the payment profile to use when making this payment.
Required if no bank account payment information is provided.

paymentProfileId.description:
The ID of the payment profile. Required if no bank account payment
information is provided.

submissionDate.description: The date the payment was submitted.

processedDate.description:
The date the payment was processed by our payment provider. This is
NOT the date it posted to the given bank.

status.description: The status of the given payment.

paymentInstructions.description:
Customer provided instructions on how to apply the payment. Required
when submitting an amount other than the amount currently due.

billingMode.description: The frequency of the bill.

email.description: The email address the payment confirmation was sent to.

suspenseInd.description: Identifies whether the payment went to the suspense account.

paymentMethodCode.description: The payment method used to process the payment. Valid values are ACH, Wallet,CC

accountType.description: Type of bank account. Valid values are Checking and Savings.

secCode.description:
The method the approval to use the bank account information was
obtained. Valid values are TEL (telephone), WEB (user-initiated
online), PPD (prearranged payment and deposit).

bankAccountPayment.description: Bank account information used when submitting a payment.

cardType.description:
The credit card company backing the transaction. Valid values are
VISA, MC (Mastercard), AMEX (American Express), DV (Discover).

authorizationCode.description:
The code obtained from the credit card processor issued when the
payment authorization request was done.

cardOrderId.description:
The credit card processors order ID that identifies the purchase
agrangement.

last4.description: The last four digits of the crdit card.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the crdit card.

fullName.description: fullname of card holder

cardNumberLastFour.description: The last four digits of the credit card.

creditCardPayment.description: Credit card information used when submitting a payment.

runDate.description: The date the BAV validation check was run.

resultCode.description:
The BAV validation outcome. This indicates whether the validation
was successful or not.

validationLevel.description: Translated resultCode value as stored in wallet preference.

agreements.description: An array of agreements with PAC Data

agreementKey.description:
A 4-part holding identification used to uniquely specify an MM
holding, consisting of Holding ID Prefix, Holding ID Primary,
Holding ID Suffix and Admin System.

lineOfBusiness.description:
The highest level designation of the product type for a
holding.  For example Life, DI, Annuity.

prefix.description: Any name prefix of the insured such as Dr., Mr., Mrs., etc.

firstName.description: The first name of the insured.

lastName.description: The last name of the insured.

suffix.description: Any name suffix of the insured such as Jr., Sr., III, etc.

fullName.description: The full name of the insured.

birthDate.description: The date of birth of the insured.

billingMode.description:
A billing option available on premium paying policies.
Examples of each mode include annual, semi-annual,
quarterly, and monthly, Single Premium or No Bill

billedPremium.description:
Billed premium includes all premiums (both the base policy
and any applicable rider premiums) on the policy bill.

recurringPayments.description: Information on an existing PAC account setup.

bankAccountHolder.description: The name of the bank account holder.

bankName.description: The name of the bank the draft is drawn from.

routingNumber.description: The routing number of the bank the draft is drawn from.

accountNumber.description: The bank account number the draft is drawn from.

accountType.description:
The type of bank account the draft is drawn from. Checking or
Savings.

draftDay.description: the day of the month on which the draft is taken.

startDate.description: The first day the PAC draft is effective. Format - yyyy-MM-dd.

endDate.description: The last day the PAC draft is effective. Format - yyyy-MM-dd.

additionalAgreements.description: An array of agreements that are on also the PAC account.

pacSetupInfo.description: Information needed to setup a PAC account on the agreement.

accountTypes.description:
An array of bank account types that can be used for the draft -
Checking or Savings.

defaultDraftDay.description: The default draft day for the policy

availableDraftDays.description: The available draft days for the policy

canChangeDraftAmount.description:
The ability to change the draft amount for the policy - true of
false.

canChangeDraftDay.description: The ability to change the draft day for the policy - true of false.

availableFrequencies.description: An array of valid payment frequencies the PAC can be setup for.

policyIsPastDueMessage.description:
if the policy is past due -return message stating that multiple
drafts will happen next month

contactInformationMessage.description: Message stating why contact information is needed.

termsAndConditions.description: Terms and Conditions for setting up a PAC account

modalPremiums.description:
Projected modal premium amounts for the different payment
frequencies.

billingType.description:

values are REG or PAC.

billingMode.description:

SA, A.

Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual.

amount.description:

type.

annualizedAmount.description: The amount multiplied by the billingMode.

modalCharge.description: The amount charged for electing a billing mode other than Annual.

apr.description: The APR of the modal charge.

post.description: Submit a premium payment by an unauthenticated customer for the given agreement key.

agreements.description: An array of payments to be submitted / modified

paymentMethod.description:
Type of payment. Valid values are ACH or CC (credit card).
Applies to GuestPay (payments made by unauthenticated
user) only.

billAmountDue.description:
Amount due of the bill being paid. Applies to GuestPay
(payments made by unauthenticated user) only.

billDueDate.description:
Due date of the bill being paid. Format - yyyy-MM-dd.
Applies to GuestPay (payments made by unauthenticated
user) only.

paymentInstructions.description:
Customer provided instructions on how to apply the
payment. Required when submitting an amount other than the
amount currently due.

email.description:
The email address to send the payment confirmation to.
Optional. If not sent the email will be sent to the email
address of the registered owner.

suspenseInd.description:
Identifies whether the payment should be sent to the
suspense account. CSR only. Valid values are Y or N.

loanToPayPremiumIndicator.description: Indicates whether the policy is eligile for Loans to Pay Premium feature.  Valid values are Y or N.

submitAPLPaymentInd.description: Indicates whether the payment is an APL payment.  Valid values are Y or N.

accountType.description: Type of bank account. Valid values are Checking and Savings.

secCode.description:
The method the approval to use the bank account information was
obtained. Valid values are TEL (telephone), WEB (user-initiated
online), PPD (prearranged payment and deposit).

bankAccountPayment.description: Bank account information used when submitting a payment

bankHolderInfo.description:
Mailing address of the bank account holder. Applies to
GuestPay (payments made by unauthenticated user) only.

firstName.description: The first name of the person who owns the bank account.

lastName.description: The last name of the person who owns the bank account.

line1.description:
The address of the person who owns the bank account.
Optional.

line2.description:
Additional address of the bank account holder.
Optional.

line3.description:
Additional address of the bank account holder.
Optional.

city.description: The city of the bank account holder. Optional.

state.description: The state of the bank account holder. Optional.

postalCode.description: The zip code of the bank account holder. Optional.

email.description: Email address of the bank account holder.

phone.description:
Phone number of the bank account holder. Optional.
Valid formats - (111) 222-3333, 1112223333,
111-222-3333

cardType.description:
The credit card company backing the transaction. Valid values are
VISA, MC (Mastercard), AMEX (American Express), DV (Discover).

authorizationCode.description:
The code obtained from the credit card processor issued when the
payment authorization request was done.

cardOrderId.description:
The credit card processors order ID that identifies the purchase
agrangement.

last4.description: The last four digits of the crdit card.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the crdit card.

fullName.description: fullname of card holder

cardNumberLastFour.description: The last four digits of the credit card.

creditCardPayment.description: Credit card information used when submitting a payment

runDate.description: The date the BAV validation check was run.

resultCode.description:
The BAV validation outcome. This indicates whether the validation
was successful or not.

validationLevel.description: Translated resultCode value as stored in wallet preference.

transType.description: The API request executed by the consumer.

transGuid.description: Unique identifier for this exact transaction.

transExecDateTS.description: Date / Time the request was executed.

List of Errors, Warnings and or informational messages returned by
the back end service or related to the processing of the initial
request. Can contain service failures, validation messages...etc.

msgType.description: Type of message. ERROR, WARNING, INFORMATIONAL

msgCode.description: Alphanumeric code associated with the message.

msgDescription.description: Description inidicating what the message pertains to.

payments.description: An array of responses related to the submitted payments

success.description:
Boolean indicator of whether or not the payment operation was
successful. This does NOT indicate if the payment was processed yet.
Only that the request was successfully received.

paymentId.description:
The ID associated to the payment. This ID is used when modifying
/ deleting existing payments. It is NOT required when submitted
NEW payments.

lastName.description: The last name of the Insured

Billed premium includes all premiums (both the base policy

Policy is associated to an Electronic billing or electronic

company, organization, or group sends its bills over the

addresses.description: Address(es) used to submit a payment by mail

line1.description:
In USPS defined as Primary Address Line that includes the street
address, post office box number, rural route number, or highway
contract number. Mail addressed to occupants of multi-unit buildings
should include information like apartment, suite, or room number, or
other unit designation.  These secondary unit designators should use
postal-approved abbreviations.  If a secondary unit designator
cannot fit at the end of the primary address line, put it on the
line ABOVE the primary address line, NOT the line below.  The full
street name should always be spelled out completely, but street
suffixes, like Street, Avenue or Boulevard may be abbreviated using
postal-approved standards.  The primary address line should always
be directly above the line containing the city, state, and ZIP code.

line2.description:
In USPS defined as Secondary Address Line. If a building name is
used, place it on the secondary address line.  If a suite or
apartment number does not fit at the end of the PRIMARY ADDRESS
LINE, place it on the SECONDARY ADDRESS LINE.  The secondary address
line may contain nonessential address data, e.g., C/O Jim Smith or
attn:Mary Jones.  The secondary address line should always be
directly above the primary address line.

line3.description:
An optional Address Line that is not defined in USPS that goes ABOVE
Address Line 2.  It can contain information such as Business or
Company name, etc.

city.description:
An urban area with a large population and a particular
administrative, legal, or historical status.  This includes towns
and villages.

state.description:
Identification for a unit of the nation set by ISO.  For United
States it is defined as state.  For Canada it is defined as
province.  For example:Alabama, Australian Captial Territory,
Queensland.

countryName.description: A sub-unit of regional self-government within a larger jurisdiction

countryCode.description:
The values for countries of the world - habited and
uninhabited.  Example United States of America.  In USPS standards
the Country should appear below the City, State, and Zip line
written in full (no abbreviations) and in capital letters.

postalCode.description:
A number that identifies each postal delivery in the United States
and foreign countries.

domesticForeignCode.description: Identifies address as foreign or domestic.

province.description:

province.  For example:Alabama, Australian Captial Territory,
Queensland.
